languages.text: "Ведущая-вперед — единоутробная сестра этого слуги дыма, огня и пепла. Она появилась на свет из чрева матери первой, и потому была наречена следующей правительницей племени. А этот слуга — щитом, что отводит беды от своей госпожи. Спустя множество лет, когда в этом слуге проснулся дар Бога-орла, Ведущая-вперед нарекла своего брата жрецом племени".

traits.locale_text: "Ведущая-вперед — единоутробная сестра этого слуги дыма, огня и пепла. Она появилась на свет из чрева матери первой, и потому была наречена следующей правительницей племени. А этот слуга — щитом, что отводит беды от своей госпожи. Спустя множество лет, когда в этом слуге проснулся дар Бога-орла, Ведущая-вперед нарекла своего брата жрецом племени".

languages.text: "Leads-Ahead is the half-sister of this servant of smoke, fire, and ash. She was the first to emerge from the mother's womb and thus named the next ruler of the tribe. And this servant was the shield to fend off disasters from his ruler. Many years later, when the gift of the Eagle-God awakened inside this servant, Leads-Ahead named her brother the priest of her tribe."
languages.original_text: "Ведущая-вперед — единоутробная сестра этого слуги дыма, огня и пепла. Она появилась на свет из чрева матери первой, и потому была наречена следующей правительницей племени. А этот слуга — щитом, что отводит беды от своей госпожи. Спустя множество лет, когда в этом слуге проснулся дар Бога-орла, Ведущая-вперед нарекла своего брата жрецом племени".

traits.locale_text: "Leads ahead is the uterine sister of this servant of the smoke, fire and ash. She was the first one to emerge from the mother's womb and thus named the next ruler of the tribe. And this servant — the shield to fend the disasters away from his ruler. Many years later, when the gift of the Eagle-God awakened inside this servant, Leads-Ahead named her brother as the priest of her tribe."

"Leads ahead is the uterine sister of this servant of the smoke, fire and ash. She was the first one to emerge from the mother's womb and thus named the next ruler of the tribe. And this servant — the shield to fend the disasters away from his ruler. Many years later, when the gift of the Eagle-God awakened inside this servant, Leads-Ahead named her brother as the priest of her tribe."

"Leads-Ahead is the half-sister of this servant of smoke, fire, and ash. She was the first to emerge from the mother's womb and thus named the next ruler of the tribe. Many years later, when the gift of the Eagle-God awakened inside this servant, Leads-Ahead named her brother the priest of her tribe."

languages.text: «Jefa-de-Todos es la medio hermana de este siervo del humo, el fuego y la ceniza. Fue la primera en salir del vientre materno, y por eso fue elegida jefa de la tribu. Y este siervo es el escudo que mantiene los desastres alejados de su jefa. Muchos años después, cuando el don del Dios Águila despertó dentro de este siervo, Jefa-de-Todos nombró a su hermano sacerdote de su tribu».
languages.original_text: "Leads-Ahead is the half-sister of this servant of smoke, fire, and ash. She was the first to emerge from the mother's womb and thus named the next ruler of the tribe. And this servant was the shield to fend off disasters from his ruler. Many years later, when the gift of the Eagle-God awakened inside this servant, Leads-Ahead named her brother the priest of her tribe."

traits.locale_text: «Jefa-de-Todos es la hermana uterina de este siervo del humo, el fuego y la ceniza. Fue la primera en salir del vientre materno, y por eso fue elegida jefa de la tribu. Y este siervo, el escudo que mantiene los desastres alejados de su jefa. Muchos años después, cuando el don del Dios Águila despertó dentro de este siervo, Jefa-de-Todos nombró a su hermano sacerdote de su tribu».

languages.text: “‘先导’是此仆人同母异父的姐妹。她是第一个从母亲的子宫中诞生的，因此被任命为部落的新任酋长。此仆人曾是为她抵御灾难的盾牌。多年之后，当鹰神的馈赠在此仆人体内被唤醒时，‘先导’便任命此仆人担任部落的祭司。”
languages.original_text: "Leads-Ahead is the half-sister of this servant of smoke, fire, and ash. She was the first to emerge from the mother's womb and thus named the next ruler of the tribe. And this servant was the shield to fend off disasters from his ruler. Many years later, when the gift of the Eagle-God awakened inside this servant, Leads-Ahead named her brother the priest of her tribe."

traits.locale_text: “‘先导’是此仆人同母异父的姐妹。她是第一个从母亲的子宫中诞生的，因此被任命为部落的新任酋长。此仆人则是为她抵御灾难的盾牌。多年之后，当鹰神的馈赠在此仆人体内被唤醒时，‘先导’便任命此仆人担任部落的祭司。”

languages.text: « Mène-la-Marche est la sœur utérine de ce serviteur de la fumée, du feu et des cendres. Comme c'est elle qui a émergé la première du ventre de la mère, il a été décidé qu'elle serait la prochaine chef de la tribu et que ce serviteur serait le bouclier qui la protège des catastrophes. Bien des années plus tard, lorsque le don de l'Aigle-Dieu s'est éveillé en ce serviteur, Mène-la-Marche l'a nommé prêtre de sa tribu. »
languages.original_text: "Leads-Ahead is the half-sister of this servant of smoke, fire, and ash. She was the first to emerge from the mother's womb and thus named the next ruler of the tribe. And this servant was the shield to fend off disasters from his ruler. Many years later, when the gift of the Eagle-God awakened inside this servant, Leads-Ahead named her brother the priest of her tribe."

traits.locale_text: « Mène-la-Marche est la sœur utérine de ce serviteur de la fumée, du feu et des cendres. Comme c'est elle qui a émergé la première du ventre de la mère, il a été décidé qu'elle serait la prochaine chef de la tribu et que ce serviteur serait le bouclier qui la protège des catastrophes. Bien des années plus tard, lorsque le don de l'Aigle-Dieu s'est éveillé dans ce serviteur, Mène-la-Marche l'a nommé prêtre de sa tribu. »

languages.text: 「先導者は、この煙と火と灰のしもべの異母姉だ。彼女は母親の胎内から最初に出てきたため、部族の次の支配者に指名された。そして、このしもべは支配者を災いを遠ざける盾となったのだ。何年か後、鷲神の贈り物がこのしもべの中で目覚めたとき、先導者は彼女の弟を部族の司祭に指名したのだ」
languages.original_text: "Leads-Ahead is the half-sister of this servant of smoke, fire, and ash. She was the first to emerge from the mother's womb and thus named the next ruler of the tribe. And this servant was the shield to fend off disasters from his ruler. Many years later, when the gift of the Eagle-God awakened inside this servant, Leads-Ahead named her brother the priest of her tribe."

traits.locale_text: 「先導者は、この煙と火と灰のしもべの異母姉だ。彼女は母親の胎内から最初に出てきたため、部族の次の支配者に指名された。そして、このしもべは支配者を災いを遠ざける盾となったのだ。何年か後、鷲神の贈り物がこのしもべの中で目覚めたとき、先導者は彼女の弟を部族の司祭に指名したのだ」

languages.text: "Geht-voran ist die Halbschwester dieses Dieners von Rauch, Feuer und Asche. Sie ist als Erste aus dem Schoss der Mutter gekrochen und wurde daher zur nächsten Herrscherin des Stamms ernannt. Und dieser Diener wurde zum Schild, der Katastrophen von seiner Herrscherin fernhält. Viele Jahre später, als die Gabe des Adler-Gottes in diesem Diener erwacht ist, hat Geht-voran ihren Bruder zum Priester ihres Stammes ernannt."
languages.original_text: "Leads-Ahead is the half-sister of this servant of smoke, fire, and ash. She was the first to emerge from the mother's womb and thus named the next ruler of the tribe. And this servant was the shield to fend off disasters from his ruler. Many years later, when the gift of the Eagle-God awakened inside this servant, Leads-Ahead named her brother the priest of her tribe."

traits.locale_text: "Geht-voran ist die Halbschwester dieses Dieners von Rauch, Feuer und Asche. Sie ist als Erste aus dem Schoss der Mutter gekrochen und wurde daher zur nächsten Herrscherin des Stamms ernannt. Und dieser Diener — der Schild, um die Katastrophen von seiner Herrscherin fernzuhalten. Viele Jahre später, als die Gabe des Adler-Gottes in diesem Diener erwacht ist, hat Geht-voran ihren Bruder zum Priester ihres Stammes ernannt."

languages.text: "Yol Açan; bu duman, ateş ve kül hizmetkârının üvey kardeşidir. Ana rahminden ilk o çıkmıştır ve bundandır ki kabilenin bir sonraki hükümdarı olarak adlandırılmıştır. Bu hizmetkâr ise hükümdarına kalkan olup felaketleri uzak tutan tutmuştur. Yıllar sonra Kartal Tanrı'nın yetisi bu hizmetkârın içinde uyandığında Yol Açan da kardeşini kabilesinin rahibi ilan etmiştir."
languages.original_text: "Leads-Ahead is the half-sister of this servant of smoke, fire, and ash. She was the first to emerge from the mother's womb and thus named the next ruler of the tribe. And this servant was the shield to fend off disasters from his ruler. Many years later, when the gift of the Eagle-God awakened inside this servant, Leads-Ahead named her brother the priest of her tribe."
